documents.document: "They say I'm acting like a strumpet," grunted a vile swine. "I'm all for rejecting chastity too," oozed a vampire bat, "I'll show you how".
The vampire bat pushed the vile swine to commit despicable sins. But the swine's friends chided "It's time that you embraced chastity".
Liberal politicians like Jesse Jackson put me in mind of hippies: they're as liberal as JFK
#Irony: When the dictators that build the most prestigious palaces are also surrounded by the most subservient hirelings.
Most newspapers are disposable, but others are as 'disposable' as a kidney

Unpredictable detectives like Inspector Clouseau put me in mind of thunderstorms: they're as unpredictable as a beam of light in a hall of a thousand mirrors
I call this picture "Wrestler". I painted it with athletic Superman-blue, fit ballerina-pink and aggressive warrior-woad-blue. #WrestlerRGB https://t.co/K1yjtO7s8y
I painted this picture of #LexLuthor's innermost soul using rich Midas-gold, ambitious pantsuit-grey and domineering Christian Grey. https://t.co/eK3WIy6jkb
Most wonders are amazing, but others are as 'amazing' as fins on a fish

One does not simply walk hand-in-hand with austerity. #ThingsBoromirNeverSaid #CareerAdvice
If you are a would-be puritan that isn't willing to submit to a headlock from austerity, you may as well renounce austerity right now.
Irritable musicians like Lou Reed put me in mind of curmudgeons: they're as irritable as drivers faced with high gas prices at the pump

Erratic ladies like Cersei Lannister put me in mind of mice: they're as erratic as a kitten near a bath tap

Most warriors like Xena are capable, but others are as 'capable' as dying millipede sinking in tar

#Irony: When the weathercasters that predict undisturbed snows model devastating floods. #Undisturbed=#Devastating #Weathercaster
Amorous skunks like PepÃ© Le Pew put me in mind of studs: they're as amorous as Zeus
"I need credible opponents to help me seek solutions" sucked a logical tick "I studied logic to be a logician too" hissed a phony pit viper
"You can be my opponent," sucked the tick. Well, the pit viper was also a phony liar and engaged with the logician to seek phony solutions.
Tedious counsellors like Polonius put me in mind of pests: they're as tedious as mortgage arrears
"Yes, it is better to be a master hiring an obsequious servant than a tycoon hiring a haughty butler." #ThingsTrumpNeverSaid
Strong is the force in disgruntled alcoholics if addictions they control. Inherit principalities, they will. Happy princesses will they be. https://t.co/usDRbpEbLp
Most burdens are troublesome, but others are as 'troublesome' as a common fly
I call this picture "Pearl". I painted it with cultivated orchid-blue, polished opal-white and flashy Bollywood-tandoori-red. #PearlRGB https://t.co/D8xaEIDSrn
Jolly mascots like Ronald McDonald put me in mind of drunks: they're as jolly as Santa Claus
#Irony: When some manservants wait on "independent" lords the way maidservants wait on helpless ladies. #Manservant=#Maidservant #Lord=#Lady
#Irony: Authors publishing books that are portable, about gorillas that are hefty. #Portable=#Hefty #BookAboutGorilla
Fat directors like Alfred Hitchcock put me in mind of sausages: they're as fat as Homer Simpson
A patient named @sensitive_virgin asks "I often dream that I am turned by my enemy and become a traitor. What does this mean?"
.@sensitive_virgin, you see yourself as sensitive yet dream of becoming an insensitive traitor. I suggest you don't relinquish your virtue!
Most invaders are sinister, but others are as 'sinister' as a pop tart
Remember when inaction was exhibited by unthreatening cowards? Now, inaction is a weapon that only dreaded killers can wield.
Most kinds of propaganda are noxious, but others are as 'noxious' as the Hardy Boys
To some dowsers, water is an aromatic wine. To others, it is a noxious pollution. #Water=#Wine #Water=#Pollution
"I need opponents of note to help me study morals" squeeked a wise ant "I studied ethics to be a philosopher too" squeeked a foul sewer rat
"You can be my opponent," squeeked the ant. Well, the sewer rat was also a foul monster and pushed the philosopher to study foul morals.
Obstinate actors like Jimmy Cagney put me in mind of barbarians: they're as obstinate as my grandfather
To some stakeholders, business is a bustling bar. To others, it is a deserted island. #Business=#Bar #Business=#Island
Slow athletes like Forrest Gump put me in mind of modems: they're as slow as a turtle with a broke flipper
To some strategists, every game is a shining genius. To others, every game is a dull idiot. #Game=#Genius #Game=#Idiot
Sommeliers specialize in wines. Drinkers enjoy the pubs that hire the barmen that serve wines. Who is better? #Drinker=#Sommelier
Terse criminals like Snake Plissken put me in mind of grunts: they're as terse as a blurb
Empathy reinforces the love that leads to marriage. Energy promotes the passion that reinforces marriages. Take your pick. #Energy=#Empathy?
Most psychics are intuitive, but others are as 'intuitive' as mathematics
Weak is the force in peaceful children if childhood they leave. Plan attacks, they will. Hostile attackers will they be #ThingsYodaNeverSaid

Fast athletes like Carl Lewis put me in mind of falcons: they're as fast as a jet airliner

Most champions are magnificent, but others are as 'magnificent' as a sheep turd
Tyranny inflicts the cruelties that cause pain. Justice provides the punishment that inflicts pain. Take your pick. #Justice=#Tyranny?
Stoned hippies like Jeffrey 'The Dude' Lebowski put me in mind of losers: they're as stoned as Ozzy Osbourne
ðŸŒ•. Succumb to madness ðŸŒ–. Become a loon ðŸŒ—. Enjoy naughty fantasy ðŸŒ˜. Get called "The Vixen" by less-naughty loons #NaughtyVenn https://t.co/Xj2J4666O6

Most cats are lithe, but others are as 'lithe' as an elephant
King: A proud father, hoarding a father's treasure. #King=#Father
Most notepads are portable, but others are as 'portable' as the Eiffel Tower
Dishonor. noun. Collective term for a group of disgraced exiles and less-than-august emperors. #Emperor=#Exile
I learn so much from similes on the Web E.g., "About as thin as a cracker" Thank you, kind Web users! #ShitThatHumansSay #I_Collect_Similes
Most scientists are diligent, but others are as 'diligent' as a door rug
Remember when speeches were presented by challenging leaders? Now, speech is a masterpiece created only by intuitive artists.
Most chameleons are unpredictable, but others are as 'unpredictable' as the tide
Horde. noun. Collective term for a group of rapacious marauders and less-than-selfless servants. #Servant=#Marauder
Most pacemakers are autonomous, but others are as 'autonomous' as a buck private
To some students, knowledge is a wonderful blessing. To others, it is an awful curse. #Knowledge=#Blessing #Knowledge=#Curse

Most firesides are hospitable, but others are as 'hospitable' as the dark side of the moon
Shame deters the sin that promotes injustice. Forgiveness undos the sins that promote injustice. Take your pick. #Shame=#Forgiveness?
Greasy hackers like Julian Assange put me in mind of quesadillas: they're as greasy as a double cheeseburger
Would you rather be: 1. A sadist stricken by a sexual perversion? 2. A wuss stricken by an impotent failure? #Sadist=#Wuss
I composed this wallpaper using Bronze-orange on Beet-red. When I asked for apt names, 82 of you suggested "A Peach Sunset." #PeachSunsetRGB https://t.co/BFIKQdhluf
Most champagnes are classy, but others are as 'classy' as using plastic spoons with china
What if #BlackadderGoesForth were real? #Erasmus could be its #LtGeorgeColthurstStBarleigh: naÃ¯ve but optimistic, and scholarly too
Most nuisances are minor, but others are as 'minor' as a deadly pathogen

Last night I dreamt I was a physician, running a test. What does this mean? #Test
Well, to dream that you are taking a test indicates that you are being put to the test or being scrutinized in some way. #Test
Jaded teachers like Edna Krabappel put me in mind of reporters: they're as jaded as a rhinestone cowboy
"Hulk hate humans that open a candy store and tweet about their flour. Hulk smash puny confectioners and their flour!" #ThingsHulkNeverSaid
Most dweebs are introverted, but others are as 'introverted' as a package of coco puffs
"Join a troupe," they said. "It'll make a surefooted dancer of you," they said. Turns out I joined a troupe of awkward teenagers!
To be manipulated with and hang from a string: This can turn formidable challengers into powerless puppets. #Challenger=#Puppet
Most confrontations are perilous, but others are as 'perilous' as used condoms
I call this picture "Monster". I painted it with resilient battleship-grey, feral Tarzan-loincloth-brown and sadistic Goldfinger-gold. https://t.co/X41MCNWKCj
Lively composers like Antonio Vivaldi put me in mind of sparrows: they're as lively as a cricket
"They say I'm acting like a desperado," cackled a sinister penguin. "I'll show you how to develop real lawlessness", hooted a circus monkey.
The circus monkey inspired the sinister penguin to commit an entertaining crime. "I must never be captured" decided the penguin.
One does not simply walk into a club and become a glad enthusiast. Especially if, like me, you join a club of sad losers! #Enthusiast=#Loser
Most insecticides are poisonous, but others are as 'poisonous' as an earthworm
